tokens.name: vibes / SOL

- **LIMIT ORDER:** Medium volatility (+14.3% price change) → -3% (midpoint of -2% to -5%).  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Low volume (<$3k) → +7% (midpoint of +5% to +10%).  
- **STOP LOSS:** Low volatility → -6% (midpoint of -5% to -8%).  
- **TIME FRAME:** Low volume + stable momentum → 4h (midpoint of 2h to 6h).  
- **Momentum Context:** Stable flow suggests conservative entry with tighter SL/TP for risk management.
